t: SEAWIN | OUR TEAM
s: Greg is the Founder and CEO of Seawin. He started the company in 2010 as a shower door manufacturer. Fast forward 10+ years later and Greg has transformed the company into a international supplier of bathroom products to the hospitality industry. A simple man who enjoys the little things in life.
